sentences: Joel Grind founded Toxic Holocaust in 1999.

He originally wrote and recorded all of the band's music himself, and after a couple of demo releases (Radiation Sickness, 1999; Critical Mass, 2002), he made his official album debut as Toxic Holocaust with Evil Never Dies (2003).
In 2019 Joel Grind signed to Entertainment One, and released Primal Future: 2019 later that year.
Grind now works as a music producer, and has been involved in side projects other than Toxic Holocaust.
Current membersJoel Grind – lead vocals (1999–present), bass (1999–2008, 2015–present), guitars (1999–2015), drums (1999–2008)
Robert Gray – guitars, backing vocals (2019–present)Touring musiciansCharlie Bellmore – guitars, backing vocals (2015–2018)Past membersAl Positions – drums (2008–2009)
